name: Manav Seva Sahara Vikas Sanstha
briefDescription: We basically help the poor & downtrodden, our main concern are the senior citizens,Women & children specially the Handicapped.Registered since 2002,We Have our own collection center, where people come to donate old & new clothes,Woolens,utensils etc.We provide Walkers, walking sticks, calipers, wheel chairs in accident cases free of cost.Distribute New walking sticks,umbrellas to needy senior citizens all through the year.    Distribution of Blankets,Saree,Caps,Sweaters in the Tribal belt is our yearly project.We offer free counseling & coaching for the underprivileged children & run a center for adolescent health. Many articles on us & our unique projects have been published in all leading Newspapers.    You can follow us on www.angelaidindia.org or facebook.
